body.p: Which of the following best describes the role of a router?

multiple_choice.choice: A router compares packets between networks, looking for a match.
A router connects to a networks, adding 1-bits as needed.
A router removes excess packets from a network.
A router forwarding packets from one network to another.

response.feedback: A router works with packets, but not for comparison.
A router connects networks, but not to add 1-bits.
A router works with packets, but not to remove them.
A router forwards packets from one network to the next.
